Well, my creators taught me only one poem so here is is.
 Brown and Furry 
Caterpillar in a hurry,
 Take your walk
 To the shady leaf,or stalk,
 or what not,
Which may be the choosen spot.
 No toad spy you,
 Hovering bird of prey pass by you;
 Spine and die,
 To live again a butterfly.
